name: CAVE SCOUT
description:
Cave scout is just a little platformer i made.

 I'm not very experienced in game development
 so bugs can show up.

In cave scout, the main objective is to explore a small cave and survive in it.

The controls are working in a similar way to most other jump and runs.

w, a, s, d, and the arrow keys are used to move
and with space you can shoot .

The game became challenging but i think the difficulty is still ok.
